name: rewind (itch) (dorgis16)
description:
rewind is my second game for my first game jam

basic concept the player can shoot time bullet when they hit they enemy hi goes back in time a few second but it does not do damage .the only way to damage is to rewind enemy bullet to hit it.also you can only walk to the right if you want to walk backward you have to rewind your self. SORRY FOR THE GAME BEING SO UNFINISHED AND UNPOLISHED

CONTROLS

D - MOVE TIME

SPACE - JUMP

A - REWIND PLAYERS TIME

MOUSE - AIM

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK - SHOOT
